title: The Most Important Things We’ve Seen From Training Camp | The Ringer NFL Show
description:
The Ringer’s Kevin Clark is joined by Nora Princiotti to discuss Giants head coach Joe Judge’s coaching strategy (19:32), the Bears' kicker situation (42:17), the difference between the hype of Joe Burrow and Tua Tagovailoa (49:13), and more.
Host: Kevin Clark 
Guest: Nora Princiotti
